text: Acting is still, of course, what I love to do most. The beauty of it is that by changing characters, it never gets boring.
author: Christopher Lambert

text: I always say beauty is only sin deep.
author: Hector Hugh Munro

text: All I wanted was to connect my moods with those of Paris. Beauty paints and when it painted most, I shot.
author: Ernst Haas

text: Coming in solemn beauty like slow old tunes of Spain.
author: John Masefield

text: Where is there beauty when you see deprivation and starvation?
author: Rosalind Russell
